thread.title: Judge rules Facebook to face class action over facial recognition

title: Judge rules Facebook to face class action over facial recognition
text:
Judge rules Facebook to face class action over facial recognition 4:19pm BST - 01:07 
A U.S. federal judge ruled that Facebook must face a class action lawsuit alleging that the social network unlawfully used a facial recognition process on photos without user permission. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A U.S. federal judge ruled that Facebook must face a class action lawsuit alleging that the social network unlawfully used a facial recognition process on photos without user permission.
